segments.text: But how did you know I was working for WebTracker ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I was in LA , I met the WebTracker sales rep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He couldn't have told you . Only a few people at WebTracker know about me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The sales rep had a green note pad just like yours . He said everybody at WebTracker used them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't believe it . I can't believe I fell into your trap .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We both may be snakes , Dave , but I'm just better at it . Among the snakes , I'm the sneakiest .
segments.speaker: S2
